attributes.action: Provide a thank you bonus for key workers carrying on regardless of the risk
attributes.additional_details: I am a dustcart driver playing my part to keep our service going. All of my colleagues are worried and scared of the risk that we are facing on a daily basis. All frontline key workers are taking a huge risk in order to keep the country going and are scared. We should be shown gratitude for this so I'm requesting that keyworkers receive a bonus of 10%
attributes.background: To provide compensation for the risk key workers are undertaking to keep the country going.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
